body.p: This is the third use of Map B topic set 01. It specifies the key scope "topicset-01-third-use" on the topicset reference. This tests the case where both the topicset reference and the topicset specify a value for keyscope.
Cross reference to key "topic-01" in the scope "topicset-01-third-use": "". This reference should probably resolve.
Cross reference to key "topic-01" in the scope "topicset-01-third-use.map-b-topicset-01.topic-01": "". This reference should probably not resolve.
Cross reference to key "topic-01" in the scope "map-b-topicset-01": "". This reference should probably resolve.
